sentences.sContent: Lucy stretched up to kiss his cheek.
sentences.sCn: 露西伸长了脖子去亲吻他的脸颊。

sentences.sContent: Billy had rosy cheeks and blue eyes.
sentences.sCn: 比利脸颊红润，长着一双蓝眼睛。

sentences.sContent: Julie’s cheeks flushed with pleasure at the compliment.
sentences.sCn: 听了这赞美的话，朱莉开心得满脸通红。

trans.tranOther: the soft round part of your face below each of your eyes
